archimate:BusinessService.name: Channel Activity History
archimate:BusinessService.documentation:
Example of use: Channel Activity Analysis draws on channel activity history data to support channel usage analysis
General comment: This service domain captures selected transaction activity across multiple channels to provide recent activity details for routing and access control and provide a source of activity data for more involved channel usage analysis
Business Purpose : Consolidated customer channel usage activity is captured to support activity analysis and also is referenced for access authorization
Пример использования: Анализ активности канала опирается на данные истории активности канала для поддержки анализа использования канала
Общее замечание: Этот домен службы фиксирует выбранные действия транзакций по нескольким каналам, предоставляя последние сведения о действиях для маршрутизации и управления доступом, а также источник данных о действиях для более сложного анализа использования каналов
деловая цель Сводное активность покупателей и использования канала для анализа деятельности, а также ссылается на разрешение доступа
Service Domain - Channel Activity History This service domain captures transaction activity across multiple channels/devices to provide recent activity details (such as an attempt at a self-service product application) to influence/inform service routing. The history is also used for access control and as a source of activity data for more detailed channel usage analysis
Detailed Summary This service domains consolidates and captures customer channel usage activity to support channel activity analysis and also can be referenced for customer access authorization and routing decisions
Executive Summary This service domains consolidates and captures customer channel usage activity to support channel activity analysis and also can be referenced for customer access authorization and routing decisions
Examples Of Use Channel Activity Analysis draws on channel activity history data to support channel usage analysis to detect out of pattern behavior for customers
